Unusual process execution or command-lin.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 for process creations with suspicious command-line arguments or process names related to memory dumping or credential access tools. Use frequency analysis or entropy measures on command-line strings to identify unusual patterns.

Execution of known credential dumping to.Action: Identify execution of known credential dumping tools by monitoring Windows Event ID 4688. Cross-reference executed file hashes from Event 4688 and Zeek files.log with threat intelligence feeds. Monitor Zeek files.log for delivery of these tools.
